Text:
I watched this movie strictly on a "This is one of the sickest movies" whim considering I can handle most anything while eating my favorite meal; but ya this movie made me want to puke literally; I laughed through 2 girls 1 cup while others had to go throw up or cringe look away....thats all I need to say about that.

thx for the up TvTeam =x

Yeah this is an sick movie couldnt even watch it to the end.. It was released here in finland few years ago.. think it was 2008.
